pullrequest.title: Add carriage return support to outputbox

content.raw:
qtutils 2.2.2 includes this change and has been released on PyPI. You can upgrade with ``pip install qtutils==2.2.2``.

(the .2 is because I messed up the release and PyPI doens't let you reuse version numbers under any circumstances. It would otherwise have been 2.2.0)
content.html:
qtutils 2.2.2 includes this change and has been released on PyPI. You can upgrade with pip install qtutils==2.2.2.

(the .2 is because I messed up the release and PyPI doens't let you reuse version numbers under any circumstances. It would otherwise have been 2.2.0)
